title: Selûne's Dream
content:
Selune's Dream Evocation Cantrip 1~8 Healing 1d8 An ally you touch regains 1d8 hit points, but potentially falls into a slumber. Melee Long Rest Action

Evocation Cantrip

An ally you touch regains 1d8 hit points, but potentially falls into a slumber.

Selûne's Dream is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Selûne's Dream is a Cantrip from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

BG3 Selûne's Dream Information

Description: An ally you touch regains hit points, but possibly falls Asleep. No effect on undead and constructs Level: Cantrip School: Evocation School Casting Time: Action Range: Melee Requires Concentration: YES Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Selûne's Dream in Baldur's Gate3

Selûne's Dream can be cast by using the following Items:

Amulet of Selûne's Chosen

Selûne's Dream Tips & Notes in BG3

Elves and Half-elves are immune to sleep. The long rest requirement is tied to the amulet, not the caster. That is to say, one cannot acquire more uses by moving the amulet from character to character.
